content: additional material stuffing and yarn needle gauge is not critical made with materials called for the toy is about 3 1/2 9 cm tall for a 6 15 cm toy crochet with two strands of yarn and a 6 mm j hook this owl is the first in a set of four forest friends along with a porcupine 2 a chipmunk 3 and a skunk 4 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/forest-friends---porcupine 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/forest-friends---chipmunk 4 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/forest-friends---skunk
